message.content: This question requires knowledge about the appropriate use of a thermometer. A good place to use a thermometer is typically in the mouth, under the armpit, or in the rectum (butt) to measure body temperature accurately. Option (C) suggests using a thermometer in a wall socket, which is extremely dangerous and can result in electrocution.
